The Loader Module (pyrevit.loader)¶

The loader module manages the workflow of loading a new pyRevit session. It’s main purpose is to orchestrate the process of finding pyRevit extensions, creating dll assemblies for them, and creating a user interface in the host application.

Everything starts from sessionmgr.load_session() function...

pyRevit root level config for all pyrevit sub-modules. Sub-modules handle their specific configuration internally.

exception pyrevit.PyRevitException¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Base class for all pyRevit Exceptions. Parameters args and message are derived from Exception class.

class pyrevit._HostApplication¶

Contains current host version and provides comparison functions.

username¶

Return the username from Revit API (Application.Username)

pyrevit._find_home_directory()¶

Return the pyRevitLoader.py full directory address
